text: Aeaces () can refer to two ancient Samians: * Aeaces (father of Polycrates), who may have ruled Samos in the mid-sixth century BC. His sons Polycrates and Syloson also ruled Samos. * Aeaces (son of Syloson), grandson of the previous, who ruled Samos in the late sixth and early fifth centuries BC. Category:Ancient Samians
title: Aeaces
